content: vintage hexies is a gentle and relaxing project perfect for a beginner who has mastered the granny square and is looking for something new to try part 1 1 part 2 2 part 3 3 this is a perfect stash busting project with just tiny amounts of yarn needed to complete each hexie use up all your smallest leftovers for a wonderfully unique creation i give full details of the yarns i have used in the pattern this pattern is in uk terms with us conversions there are video tutorials to accompany this pattern by hooked by robin this pattern is also available for free in three parts on madebyanita co uk 1 https //madebyanita co uk/blog/vintage-hexies 2 https //madebyanita co uk/blog/vintage-hexies-part-2 3 https //madebyanita co uk/blog/vintage-hexies-part-3
